The video is terrific quality, although the aspect ratio is 1.85:1, not the 2.35:1 that the movie was presented in theatrically. Odd, but not terribly distracting. 

The audio is Dolby 2.0 Surround 192KB 48KHz, and has a tendency to be very front-heavy, even when using a good receiver with equalizer capabilities. The center channel especially will sound very loud, and drowns out the other channels much of the time.

Overall, this will work just fine until the official BluRay release.
